original_title: Hapag Lloyd Lanka recognized at ICS (UK) Sri Lanka Annual Awards
original_body_lines: The Institute of Chartered Shipbrokers (UK), Sri Lanka Branch organized the 29th Annual Awards Ceremony on Friday, 24th March 2023 at Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo. Kirk Baldsing – Assistant General Manager (Sales & Marketing, Customer Service and Quality), from Hapag Lloyd Lanka (Pvt) Ltd, received the award for the year 2022 ” Best Shipping Agent – Customer Service – Colombo / Europe Trade (for the 3rd consecutive year and Colombo Mediterranean Trade for the 2nd consecutive year from Jean Francois Pactet – Ambassador for France in Sri Lanka, where ICS Chairman Sri Lanka Branch Kingsley Abeywickrama was also present
